text: Guilotes is a genus of funnel weavers first described by Zhao & Li in 2018. ==Species== it contains four species: *Guilotes ludiensis Zhao & S. Q. Li, 2018 — China *Guilotes qingshitanensis Zhao & S. Q. Li, 2018 — China *Guilotes xingpingensis Zhao & S. Q. Li, 2018 — China *Guilotes yandongensis Zhao & S. Q. Li, 2018 — China ==References== ==External links== Category:Agelenidae Category:Araneomorphae genera
title: Guilotes
